resources.string: Do you want to Backup all contacts now?

Your contacts are probably the most important information in your phone, and it takes a lot of time to build up a contacts list. You do not want to lose them if your phone gets lost, or you accidentally remove all your contacts.
This is where this app comes in to play. It can back-up all your contacts in a file and allows you to place the backup file on your phone, or on the Internet in your own private email or cloud. Using the restore feature of this app, the backup file can be used to restore contacts in any Android device, anytime.
There are other apps out there that charge you an annual fees to store your contacts in the cloud, but you do not need to pay the fee since you already get free email and cloud storage with several free providers like Google, and this app allows you to leverage your free accounts.
Download this app now and get the peace of mind that your contacts will always be safe!
Free version only allows backup of up to 90 contacts. Contacts have been backed-up in file:
Open the Navigation menu in top-left to view Backup and Restore options
